name: Aureum
description: Aureum (AUR) is the digital symbol of value and trust on the TON blockchain. Inspired by the Latin word for 'gold', Aureum represents stability, growth, and a strong community vision. With a fixed supply of 1 billion tokens and 9 decimals, AUR is designed to be a modern store of value and a community-driven currency inside the TON ecosystem. Hold, trade, and build the future with Aureum.
